I like the style, fabric, color and fit!  It’s also extra long which I really like. Washes well. I have several shirts from this company and have been very happy with all of them.

I like that the material isn’t see through and the length of the shirt and the arms is really nice.

I was so disappointed when I put this t-shirt on. It’s see through! The fit was perfect ( 5’3” 130 pounds) size M. Material is very soft but I could see my bra and even my skin showed through. I ordered the cream color. Maybe with the darker colors you would not see through. I sent it back.
Shirt fits well. It is long enough to wear with leggings.
I absolutely love the shirt fits true to size would recommend it to anyone.
Super cute and comfortable shirt, fits true to size and is so soft.

I like the top and cut is very shaply.  I like the details on the shirt.  However, it is a bit sheer which I was not expecting.  I wish it was a little bit thicker fabric.  However, perfect for hot days.

This top is very stylish and soft material. It was true to size. Beautiful blue color and I like the cross design on the neck. Thin but not see through t- shirt material. Washed well and still looked good after washing. The fabric is light weight. Will be buying other colors

Love the color and fit, got an XL and is a nice fit not too big and not to small.  I am 5’2” and 185lbs. The crisscross b front is very flattering.  I will definitely buy more.
This shirt is so comfy and soft and the fit is just right.  I'm buying more!!!

This shirt is very comfortable. I saw my friend wearing one and I told her that I liked her shirt. She told be how comfortable it was and that she got it from Amazon. I’m planning on buying more in different colors!

I bought this top for my mom that was looking for comfy tops to wear on a daily.. It was super soft and light/feels like cotton (we live in Miami and don't want to sweat even more, LOL).  NOW that I know she loves it and fits well I will order the other colors and styles this seller provides.  I recommend.The size chart seems right too.  fit perfectly!

This is very nice material and isn't cheap looking.  Nice fabric blend - thank you for that and not just polyester like so many tops from many sellers here.  Ordered from size chart - size down...it runs big and is swimming on me a bit- too big - so if purchased again I would size down.
I love this blouse in black.  It is a shiny almost dressy material.  Looks different than the other colors that look more "washed"
Love the color and fit of this top! True to size - very soft fabric and looks nice. Good value, washed well.  Liked it so much I bought another color…
It is as described. It’s comfortable and attractive.
I love this top. It’s so comfortable. I’ve washed it a lot and hasn’t faded at all, super soft.
I’m hesitant to buy clothing online.  I loved this shirt when I got it. It’s a nice soft t- shirt material that washes nice.  I ordered 2 more in different colors.

评论概述: Very soft and comfortable, not to mention cute!
评论详情: I work from home and do yoga every morning before I hit the desk, so I love tops like this for wearing throughout the day. This one fits really well and I love the little criss-cross detail on the chest. It lets the color of a tank top layered under it peek through a little. A cute little touch of color! I also really like the rounded hem line. It's very flattering and slimming. I ordered a large (I am 5'6", 168#) and it fits perfectly. Not too tight, but not baggy, either. I really like the fit and the fabric is very soft and has just enough stretch, but doesn't lose it's shape. Working from home doesn't mean wearing PJ's all day, at least not for me, but it provides me the opportunity to be comfortable, and items like this are just right for that. I can feel comfortable and look presentable when someone comes to the door. I am a big fan and wear it often!

评论概述: Comfy, easy fitting, criss-cross neck detail is fun
评论详情: I like this blouse! It has more of a relaxed t-shirt vibe, but the extra detailing on the neckline is really fun and keeps it interesting. I used the size chart and the fit is perfect for me.  The material is very comfy and stretchy; again, much like a nice t-shirt. I'm tall (6') and the length works well for me, too.  The fit is quite flattering... even more-so on me with my unflattering body shape than in the photos!

I recently got the Women's V-neck shirt in sage green, and while I adore the color and the soft fabric, the fit is surprisingly large. The crisscross design on the front adds a unique and stylish twist, and the material feels light and breezy, perfect for summer wear. However, with it being bigger than expected, the crisscross bands tend to droop.  If you're considering purchasing, you might want to order a smaller size. It's a very comfortable shirt otherwise.

If you are a small or XS forget about it. If you are looking for a red shirt, forget about it. If you are short in height, forget abt it. This shirt is way oversized, too long, and more pinkish raspberry than red. And because of the size, the crossed bodice just doesn’t sit well. What a disappointment.

评论概述: Vibrant blue shirt, classier than a T-shirt
评论详情: The blue color of the shirt I ordered is a bright blue and the crisscross design in the V-neck area dresses it up more than a casual T-shirt. The material is thin and lightweight making it nice to wear on hot days. The length of the shirt has ample material to cover the midsection. It launders nicely and needs no ironing when removed from the dryer immediately after it finishes its cycle. This is a nice, casual shirt that looks nice with any type of bottom – shorts, pants, skirts – and looks nice if needing to dress up slightly more than just a T-shirt.

I’m a bigger gal that wants to feel pretty. Love the neckline. This is a soft thin (but not too thin to show through) material. It is sewn well and nice pattern. This shirt is comfortable and flattering. Very happy with it.

评论概述: Vibrant Yet Voluminous: Women's V Neck Coral Top
评论详情: I recently got this Women's V V-neck shirt in a lovely coral color, and while I adore the vibrant hue, the fit is surprisingly large. The crisscross design on the front gives it a unique and stylish twist, and the material feels light and breezy, perfect for summer wear. However, if you're considering purchasing, you might want to size down—even two sizes down. It's incredibly roomy, which could work if you prefer a very relaxed fit, but going smaller is necessary for a more traditional fit. Despite the sizing issue, I still enjoy the fun color and the casual, comfy feel of the shirt.

The fit is very flattering. Not tight but not overly loose. I'm between a small and medium. I sized down to a small and the fit is perfect. Ill.get more colors. I got the blue and it's just as pictured

This is a very pretty blouse with a soft-feeling fabric. It maintains the feel of softness and its size even after washing. The color is bright and has yet to fade in the wash. The V-neck and decoration is a flattering look and  the shirt itself is a good length.  The size, based upon the guide needs to be more accurate. It runs small and although the chart suggested a medium, it is clear I needed a large. This is important to be aware of as it is a bit "clingy."

I ordered this V-neck shirt in a Large size.  I normally wear a 10-12 shirt and this one fits a little looser than I like.  Nevertheless, the material is very, very lightweight/thin which makes it very comfortable to wear.  The rayon/polyester blend is rather like thin, T-shirt material, so I'd only wear it with jeans or shorts--not office worthy material.  It comes in several colors that are very pretty shades.  I ordered one in green, but I will probably order a couple of other colors as well.

This is my new favorite shirt! I love the design, with the v-neck and criss cross strands in between. The shirt is lightweight, breathable, and a comfortable t-shirt feel. It has the short sleeved tunic style that is tight enough in certain areas to still give you shape, but loose enough where I don't feel like I have to be sucking in while wearing it. It's a great look for running my errands and outings with mom friends at the park, and can work for casual work attire. This is a great price  for a shirt that will be worn over and over. I'd like one in every color for the closet! Mine is in blue and looks a little different in different lighting. All check the 'awesome' boxes for me.
Love the color, the fabric, the fit from the first time I tried it on. Easy care and great for summer travel. 👍

Perfect for work or going out.  Feels soft and comfortable.  I got the large because I wanted a more longer tunic type feel.  I would say the size is on point.  Washes nicely and I love the criss cross detail in front.

The top is such a pretty design with the crisscross detail. All the colors are very nice but this color in particular is very interesting. Soft and comfortable with just a bit of looseness to it. It’s true to size but it just gives you a little more room.

This shirt, in Coral Pink, has been a delightful addition to my summer wardrobe. The vibrant coral pink shade is eye-catching and perfect for the season, adding a splash of color to any outfit. The blouse features a loose, casual fit which makes it extremely comfortable, especially on warmer days. The V-neck cut adds a subtle elegance, making it versatile enough to pair with jeans for a casual look or with a skirt for a more dressed-up occasion. The fabric is soft and breathable, making this top a favorite for everyday wear. Overall, it's a great buy for anyone looking for a comfortable, stylish, and easy-to-wear summer tee.

I’m 5’4” and about 170lbs.  I wear between a large and X-Large in tops.  I bought a large and it fits the way I like but if I were intending to wear this as a tunic top I would need to have gotten an xl.  The cut is cute, it’s not too low.  The fabric is a mid weight.  The color is beautiful and has sort of a heather pattern which I like.  Sleeves are plenty long for covering arm fat.  There is nothing to dislike about this top.

评论概述: Women’s V Neck Short Sleeve Shirt
评论详情: Great casual shirt. The fit is comfortable, loose fit. Material is soft and stretchy. I like the weaving across the the v neck line the most.

I am very happy with this shirt. It feels like an extra soft T-shirt, so it is very comfortable. However, the details make it look a little dressier and nicer than a plain T-shirt. I am looking forward to using this as part of my summer wardrobe.  I purchased an XL after reading the sizing and measuring myself and I am very happy with the fit. It has a nice drape and doesn't cling to me.

Love the color of this shirt and the crisscross detailing on the collar. It is a bit clingy so if you don’t like that consider sizing up on it. It is great to pair with jeans/shorts for a casual look or with a pair of dress pants for a business casual look.
Great fit, comfortable and love the way it feels!

This top is awesome!  I love the detail at the neckline.  The fabric is light, and it's just the right length.  This will look great with a pair of shorts or jeans, and you can dress it up with a pair of slacks.  The perfect top!

I still have 10-15 lbs of baby weight to lose, and I’m not super comfortable in my skin these days. I like loose-fitting shirts that are comfortable to wear around the house or while running errands (since I work from home with the kids). This shirt checks all the boxes.  It’s made of t-shirt material, so I probably wouldn’t wear it into the office, but it looks nice enough that I can wear at home while on Zoom calls, and not look like I’m a mess…but still comfy. I ordered a medium (currently 145lbs, 5’3”) and it’s perfect for what I want. That said - if you want a more fitted shirt, I’d size down. I was either a small or medium BEFORE kids, and this medium is still loose on me when I’m heavier than usual. But this is cute, love the color - I’d order again in different colors.
Blue like the ocean. Fits true to size. I like the simple cross cross in the front.  Material washes well and I dried on low so there was no shrinking.

The shirt is very flattering. Nice color, not too peach or orange, just a soft pink peach color. Fits true to size and is not form fitting. Lays nice and loose but doesn’t look too big. Very nice casual shirt that can be dressed up with some accessories. The material is soft and well put together. No issues with washing.

This women's V-neck shirt is soft, comfortable, and fits true to size. The simple style is flattering, with a loose, casual fit that's not too big and not too tight. The material is lightweight, too, perfect for the hot summer months. I ordered this shirt in black and plan to order additional shirts in other colors.

This shirt is true to size. I ordered the size I normally wear and it fits perfectly. The fabric is a combination of polyester, rayon, and spandex. It's very soft and the color (coral pink) is true to the online photo. The stitching seems decent. There is one area on the neckline that seems sketchy so I'll keep an eye on it to see if the threads pull loose but for right now, it's all good. I can see myself wearing this shirt a lot. It's very cool and comfortable. I like it and will recommend it.

评论概述: Comfy, cute, exactly what I was looking for
评论详情: I have a similar shirt to this in black and wanted another for some color in my summer wardrobe.  It's lightweight, comfortable, and washes well.  I don't like to go out in totally plain t-shirts for whatever reason but this lets me feel like I'm wearing a regular tee but also seems a step up from "I'm going to the gym" level casual.I got the medium to ensure a loose fit and it seemed to work.  I am 5'3", 125lbs,
